item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 28th, 2019: Live from the Library (Day 1)
item.description:
This week we're taking the show out of the studio and broadcasting live-to-tape from the Hawaii State Library in downtown Honolulu. All of the music will be selected from the library's collection and then reshelved for you to borrow the next day.
This show is mostly Jazz and a little Hawaiian.
item.itunes:summary:
This week we're taking the show out of the studio and broadcasting live-to-tape from the Hawaii State Library in downtown Honolulu. All of the music will be selected from the library's collection and then reshelved for you to borrow the next day.
This show is mostly Jazz and a little Hawaiian.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 27th, 2019: Memory
item.description: On this Memorial Day I'm using the theme of memory to pick out mostly mellow songs about love and memory for this Monday evening.
item.itunes:summary: On this Memorial Day I'm using the theme of memory to pick out mostly mellow songs about love and memory for this Monday evening.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 24th, 2019: Disco!
item.description: Something different for this session of Bridging the Gap... running through some Disco! Some old, some new, some famous... and some undergound.
item.itunes:summary: Something different for this session of Bridging the Gap... running through some Disco! Some old, some new, some famous... and some undergound.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 22nd, 2019: Mushroom Jazz
item.description: So I've been itching to do another mixed show just focused on downtempo... primarily around a sub-focus called Mushroom Jazz... mostly instrumental Hip-Hop breaks with a jazzy influence pioneered by Mark Farina or a series of mixtapes. It's something to put on, chillout, sip your martini and nod your head to the beat.
item.itunes:summary: So I've been itching to do another mixed show just focused on downtempo... primarily around a sub-focus called Mushroom Jazz... mostly instrumental Hip-Hop breaks with a jazzy influence pioneered by Mark Farina or a series of mixtapes. It's something to put on, chillout, sip your martini and nod your head to the beat.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~May 21st, 2019: Moon Music
item.description: On this edition of Bridging The Gap, Paige Okamura / DJ Mermaid pays tribute to the amazing moon views we've had this past week with music written about the moon, as well as a few tracks to look at the moon to.
item.itunes:summary: On this edition of Bridging The Gap, Paige Okamura / DJ Mermaid pays tribute to the amazing moon views we've had this past week with music written about the moon, as well as a few tracks to look at the moon to.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 20th, 2019: Cool and Eclectic
item.description: This session of Bridging the Gap is going to be eclectic, yet cool... and mostly mellow, featuring music from upcoming shows, and going across, Jazz, downtempo, indie folk and other suprises.
item.itunes:summary: This session of Bridging the Gap is going to be eclectic, yet cool... and mostly mellow, featuring music from upcoming shows, and going across, Jazz, downtempo, indie folk and other suprises.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 17th, 2019: Fun and Eclectic
item.description: Nothing special planned out for this session of Bridging the Gap... just going to keep the music fun and eclectic going into the weekend.
item.itunes:summary: Nothing special planned out for this session of Bridging the Gap... just going to keep the music fun and eclectic going into the weekend.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 16th, 2019: Songs to Beat the Heat
item.description: It my not be summertime... yet. But the uptick in temperature has our DJ-in-Training, Harrison Patiño is playing upbeat indie, world and eclectic tunes to beat the heat.
item.itunes:summary: It my not be summertime... yet. But the uptick in temperature has our DJ-in-Training, Harrison Patiño is playing upbeat indie, world and eclectic tunes to beat the heat.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 15th, 2019: Ups and Downs
item.description: It's been an emotionally draining week... and it's only Wednesday. So this session of Bridging the Gap is all about healing, hope and coping with loss.
item.itunes:summary: It's been an emotionally draining week... and it's only Wednesday. So this session of Bridging the Gap is all about healing, hope and coping with loss.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~May 14th, 2019: Moving On
item.description: On this edition of Bridging The Gap, Paige Okamura / DJ Mermaid plays a collection of mostly mellow, somewhat emotional songs about "moving on", whatever that may mean for you.
item.itunes:summary: On this edition of Bridging The Gap, Paige Okamura / DJ Mermaid plays a collection of mostly mellow, somewhat emotional songs about "moving on", whatever that may mean for you.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 13th, 2019: Spanish Rhythm
item.description: The design for this show started with a modern take on Spanish Flamenco... but evolved into an exploration of Spanish guitar, electro tango, gypsy swing and more.
item.itunes:summary: The design for this show started with a modern take on Spanish Flamenco... but evolved into an exploration of Spanish guitar, electro tango, gypsy swing and more.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 10th, 2019: Random Friday Funtime
item.description: So there's no real theme for this session of Bridging the Gap. I'm just picking upbeat (fun) music for this Friday evening to lighten the air on the darkest of nights.
item.itunes:summary: So there's no real theme for this session of Bridging the Gap. I'm just picking upbeat (fun) music for this Friday evening to lighten the air on the darkest of nights.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 9th, 2019: Laid Back Thursday Tracks
item.description: Harrison was sick this week, so to embrace his ill health... he went in the exact opposite of Paige Okamura's "Running" playlist from Tuesday... and is putting together a collection of laid back songs to ease you into your evening.
item.itunes:summary: Harrison was sick this week, so to embrace his ill health... he went in the exact opposite of Paige Okamura's "Running" playlist from Tuesday... and is putting together a collection of laid back songs to ease you into your evening.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 8th, 2019: Rhythms from the U.K.
item.description: Picking out music entirely from artists from the U.K. for this session of Bridging the Gap. Weaving in and out of downtempo, grime, big beat, and a little neo-soul.
item.itunes:summary: Picking out music entirely from artists from the U.K. for this session of Bridging the Gap. Weaving in and out of downtempo, grime, big beat, and a little neo-soul.

item.title: Bridging The Gap~May 7th, 2019: Songs To Run To
item.description: Whether you're running for excercise, or running from your problems, Paige Okamura a.k.a. DJ Mermaid has curated two hours of (mostly indie rock) music to run to. She's got you covered tonight as you start out on a high, songs to give you that much need encouragement in the middle, and finally easing the tempo for a nice cool down
item.itunes:summary: Whether you're running for excercise, or running from your problems, Paige Okamura a.k.a. DJ Mermaid has curated two hours of (mostly indie rock) music to run to. She's got you covered tonight as you start out on a high, songs to give you that much need encouragement in the middle, and finally easing the tempo for a nice cool down

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 6th, 2019: Mellow and New
item.description: This session of Bridging the Gap is going to be a collection of new songs that move through indie rock, jazz and modern psychedelic rock.
item.itunes:summary: This session of Bridging the Gap is going to be a collection of new songs that move through indie rock, jazz and modern psychedelic rock.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 3rd, 2019: Friday Color
item.description: Clearing off some new music on my desk and keeping the late night air filled with tribal percussion, mariachi and other delights.
item.itunes:summary: Clearing off some new music on my desk and keeping the late night air filled with tribal percussion, mariachi and other delights.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 2nd, 2019: Sultry Sounds for Sultry Weather
item.description: Embracing a week of heat, humidity, and rain... our DJ-in-Training Harrison Patiño offers up some sultry sounds for sultry weather.
item.itunes:summary: Embracing a week of heat, humidity, and rain... our DJ-in-Training Harrison Patiño offers up some sultry sounds for sultry weather.

item.title: Bridging the Gap ~ May 1st, 2019: Tropicalia
item.description: Taking on a more tropical note for this session of Bridging the Gap. Exploring new Bossa Nova, Latin, and indie fusion... all anchored around new music from Claude Fontaine (pictured).
item.itunes:summary: Taking on a more tropical note for this session of Bridging the Gap. Exploring new Bossa Nova, Latin, and indie fusion... all anchored around new music from Claude Fontaine (pictured).

item.title: Bridging the Gap~April 30rd, 2019: Tribute to Jack de Mello & Merrie Monarch 2019 Recap
item.description: Paige Okamura pays tribute to composer, arranger, producer, and recording artist Jack de Mello, following his recent passing at the age of 102. In honor of his innovation and influence on modern-day Hawaiian music, she curates a selection of his work and the Hawaiian musicians he worked with, along with the mele of some of her favorite performances from this year's Merrie Monarch hula festival.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura pays tribute to composer, arranger, producer, and recording artist Jack de Mello, following his recent passing at the age of 102. In honor of his innovation and influence on modern-day Hawaiian music, she curates a selection of his work and the Hawaiian musicians he worked with, along with the mele of some of her favorite performances from this year's Merrie Monarch hula festival.
